A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: LOVE LOVE LOVED it! I have been a Star Wars fan since first watching episodes 4\, 5\, & 6 when I was a little girl. I was less than enthused with episodes 1\, 2\, & 3. When The force awakens came out I was excited about the direction they were going in and haven't been disappointed a bit by The Last Jedi. Will any new Star Wars live up to the original three? It would be very hard if not impossible\, but this movie is well made\, has a great story line\, and really fits with the original trilogy. Well done!
